messages: 180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:11): has anyone here ever had the problem of being able to associate w/an ap .. but not being able to ping the gateway?
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:11): akemi: you're certain that it's associated?
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:12): akemi: is the gateway located on the AP?
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:12): yes.. it is.. to both Q's
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:12): i have a static ip setup
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:12): and the route table is correct
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:14): i can connect through eth0 land line but not through wireless .. the signal strength is 90%
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:14): i'm sitting right next to my router w/the laptop
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:15): akemi: try changing channels i guess.
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:15): hrm thats a fairly new chip
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:15): it may not have working HAL support
5970bd1634756232824f68fe3b6bb725 (13:15): maybe your signal is misrepesented or has no noise calculation
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:15): i'm using the madwifi driver out of 'current'
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:15): it was released last month? or this month.. i know it's recent
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:18): yeah.. im pretty happy w/this combo .. if I can only get it to work through linux
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:19): everything is wide open.. no encryption ...  a/g mode is turned off .. no security at all
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:19): i even went through every setting in iwpriv
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:28): did you remember to ifconfig ath0 up
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:29): what distro are you using?
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:30): I'm still thinking it might be a HAL issue
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:31): when i do the down command it says interface ath0 not configured
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:32): what interfaces does iwconfig detect wireless extensions on?
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:32): then do the ifup ath0 then
a20c00215ff91bf327808fcf6d1b00bc (13:33): see if it got the IP you wanted
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:33): yes.. it's still using 192.168.1.105 like I assigned
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:37): hmm.. dont think so.. this is a new linksys wrt54gx2 router.. no roamabout settings are documented at all
180b9648f83fff074aaae139743c4ffd (13:39): the ap bssid is listed in iwconfig
